      • takeAimAndShoot

      • predictTargetPosition

        private Point2D predictTargetPosition(GameCharacter target)
        predicts where the target will be located in the time it takes for a projectile to reach it. This uses a similar logic to the Pursuit steering behavior. Used by TakeAimAndShoot.
